WorkItem.Description:
I am able to load most of characters from armory with no hassle.
However, I cannot load the character "Banut" on "Mal'Ganis US"
I am concerned it may be due to the fact that i'm wearing the Strength ring from ICC and also have Shadow's Edge.
I have tried Rawr 2, Rawr 3 (offline and online) and get the same results with both.
I have tried it on two non-identical systems. I even formatted my hard drive, and went from XP to Vista to try, and it still crashes when I load from armory when it hits the "Parsing Character Data" step.
I have cleared item cache, used the windows cleanup tool to wipe out silverlight and reinstall it. Iv'e made sure iv'e got .NET updated, and all windows updates are current.
Currently our battlegroup is bugged and you will not be able to pull up the character in armory, however this has been happening prior to this issue.

Comments.Message: There is an infinite loop in Rawr.Retribution.Simulator.GetT10DivineStormCooldownProbability because the passed in parameter swingSpeed has value 0. I'm not sure exactly when this happens, but it seems to be related with items still loading at which point MainHand.Item.Speed is 0.
Interesting. Anything we can do on the client side to resolve this or work around it? Or will we have to wait for an update would you say?

Closing this, so we can keep this issue confined to a single issue.  
Use http://rawr.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=16780 for followup.
